statements: SELECT pharmacy_name, location FROM pharmacies;
SELECT * FROM pharmacies WHERE pharmacy_id = 1;
SELECT pharmacy_name, phone_number FROM pharmacies WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM pharmacies ORDER BY pharmacy_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM pharmacies;
SELECT * FROM pharmacies WHERE pharmacy_name = 'ABC Pharmacy';
SELECT pharmacy_name, location FROM pharmacies WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT pharmacy_id, pharmacy_name FROM pharmacies WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM pharmacies WHERE pharmacy_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT pharmacy_name, phone_number FROM pharmacies ORDER BY pharmacy_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM pharmacy_orders;
SELECT * FROM pharmacy_orders WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT prescription, patient_id FROM pharmacy_orders ORDER BY order_id DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM pharmacy_inventory WHERE price < 10.00;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM pharmacy_inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM pharmacy_orders WHERE order_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, prescription FROM pharmacy_orders WHERE patient_id = 100 ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT item_name, price FROM pharmacy_inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM pharmacy_orders po JOIN pharmacy_inventory pi ON po.order_id = pi.item_id WHERE po.order_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, prescription, item_name, price FROM pharmacy_orders po JOIN pharmacy_inventory pi ON po.order_id = pi.item_id WHERE po.order_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM prescriptions;
SELECT medication_name, quantity FROM prescriptions WHERE date_issued >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, phone_number FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT medication_name, expiration_date FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT medication_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE expiration_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT prescription_id, patient_id, medication_name, quantity, date_issued FROM prescriptions WHERE medication_name = 'Aspirin' ORDER BY date_issued DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth, phone_number FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth <= '1990-01-01';
SELECT medication_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_stock FROM inventory GROUP BY medication_name HAVING total_stock > 100;

SELECT p.patient_name, p.date_of_birth, pr.medication_name, pr.quantity FROM patients p JOIN prescriptions pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id WHERE pr.date_issued BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT medication_name, expiration_date FROM inventory WHERE expiration_date < CURRENT_DATE();
SELECT * FROM Pharmacies;
SELECT pharmacy_name, location FROM Pharmacies ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT pharmacy_name, location FROM Pharmacies WHERE location='New York';
SELECT patient_name, dob FROM PatientProfiles WHERE dob < '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Pharmacies;
SELECT pharmacy_name, location FROM Pharmacies ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT pp.patient_name, p.item_name, i.quantity FROM PatientProfiles pp JOIN Inventory i ON pp.patient_id = i.pharmacy_id JOIN PrescriptionOrders p ON pp.patient_id = p.patient_id;
SELECT p.item_name, p.quantity FROM Inventory p WHERE p.quantity > 50;
SELECT DISTINCT pp.patient_name, p.item_name FROM PatientProfiles pp JOIN PrescriptionOrders p ON pp.patient_id = p.patient_id ORDER BY pp.patient_name ASC, p.item_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_profiles;
SELECT pharmacy_name, location FROM pharmacies;
SELECT item_name, price, quantity FROM inventory WHERE price > 50;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_profiles ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT prescription_details FROM prescription_orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT * FROM prescription_orders;
SELECT patient_id, full_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_profiles ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT pharmacy_name, location FROM pharmacies WHERE location LIKE '%CA%';
SELECT prescription_id, order_id, patient_id FROM prescriptions WHERE order_id = 1001;
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity, price FROM inventory ORDER BY price DESC, quantity ASC;
